sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_email_action_b9f9e0b9475302103761bb30116d43b1
sys_update_xml.payload:
falsefalsetruec97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917asys_usertext/html 

 

]]>falsefalseDemo.Birthday.userfalsefalsefalsefalseeventfalseevent.parm1falseA birthday is a very special event, and when it turns out to be of someone very close to you, it gets a whole lot special. Under such circumstances, you definitely need to think of something that stands out from all others. While you find the best gift for them, you need to have some heart-touching birthday wishes, messages, or quotes for them.

For this article, we are going to present some impressive and heart-touching wishes, messages, and quotes that you can use to wish a birthday to someone. Along with that, we shall also cover a comprehensive guide explaining what you can do if you wish to edit an editable PDF wishing card with a PDF editor.

]]>DemoUserfalse100falsetrue

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">u_birthday_dateONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_birthday_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ON" or="false" value="Today@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Demo_Birthday_notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// // Add your code here
	// var curDate = new GlideDate();
	// var birthemp = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	// //birthemp.addQuery('u_birtday_date','curDate');
	// birthemp.query();
	// while(birthemp.next())
	// {
	// gs.eventQueue('Demo.Birthday.user',current,'birthemp.email');
	// }

	gs.addInfoMessage("Happy Birthday To You !");

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-10 09:23:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>80b6a4b5475302103761bb30116d4373</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Demo_Birthday_notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_80b6a4b5475302103761bb30116d4373</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-10 09:29:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=80b6a4b5475302103761bb30116d4373"/></record_update>
